title: Carbon Footprint Analysis of an Outpatient Dermatology Practice at an Academic Medical Center

abstract: Importance There is growing awareness of the US health sector's substantial contribution to the country's greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions, exacerbating the health threats from climate change. Reducing health care's environmental impact …

title: Artificial Intelligence and Dermatology

abstract: Is This Mole Concerning? What Is This Rash? You might have had these questions and wondered how to find reliable answers. Sometimes it is hard to see a doctor, so you might look online first. But can you trust the online information or application …
